Yegizaw Michael bụ onye omenkà ama ama na Eritrea
O gosipụtara nka ya na mba dị iche iche nke Eritrea, Kenya, Uganda, United States na Austria ma merie ọtụtụ ihe nrite na onyinye
N'afọ 1995, ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe kacha mma n'afọ na Kenya
Ọ bụkwa onye mmeri ugboro abụọ nke Eritrea's Raimok National Art Award maka 1996 na 1997
N'afọ 1997, Yegizaw bụ onye malitere, onye nhazi na onye nduzi ihe nkiri nke Artists Against AIDS national awareness campaign na Eritrea

Ndị na-ese ihe megide ọrịa AIDS gụnyere ihe karịrị ndị na-ese egwu, ndị na-eti egwu, ndị-ede uri Eritrea iri atọ ndị jikọrọ aka na mkpọsa mba niile iji kụziere ma mee ka ndị mmadụ mara banyere ọdachi nke ọrịa AIDS
Mgbe ọ kwagara US (ebe ọ bi ugbu a) o mepụtara ọtụtụ mosaics dị ka Seattle Children Art Museum na ndị ọzọ.
